text: Midnight City is a 2011 song by French music group, M83. It went to number 34 in the United Kingdom, number 30 in Scotland, number 37 in Australia and number 8 in France. ==Track listing== ===Remix EP=== On 27 September 2011, M83 released a remix EP in advance of the album. The following tracks were on the EP:Midnight City (Remixes) â€“ EP. iTunes Store. 27 September 2011. title: Midnight City
